episode: My brother surprised me with tickets to a show.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: My brother surprised me with tickets to a show.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: What an awesome surprise! Which show are you going to see?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It was broadway musical. MJ. I was not expecting it

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: How wonderful! Broadway is such a treat!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It is. He got the tickets super last minute

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's impressive! Your brother's quite thoughtful.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I was not expecting it

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: A delightful surprise indeed!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It was surprising. It wasn't even a special occassion

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a nice gesture!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: But it was a welcome surprise after a hard week

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Delighted to hear that!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It was very thoughtful

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Indeed, a generous and considerate act!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It was surprising that he got tickets

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: A remarkable feat, for sure!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It was a great feat and a great treat

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: What a fantastic gesture!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It was. I really am lucky

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: You truly are!
